item.description:
Come join us for a 3.3 easy mile loop through beautiful woods and enjoy a gorgeous waterfall and much, much more! Dogs must be leashed at all time (park rules) and no aggressive dogs please! At the turn around point there is a waterfall and stream for the dogs to frolic in and for us to take a break!
Directions: From Middletown, take rt.66 west to the junction of rt.157. Turn left onto rt.157. The park entrance is a few miles up on the left. Check out mapquest for further directions if needed.
We will meet in the main parking lot at 11:00 sharp. Look for my greyhound and you found us! If you rsvp yes, but are unable to make it-PLEASE change your response or notify me to let us know you will not be joining us! #860-309-3933
Two legged friends -with out dogs- are also welcome to join us!!!

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Dog Walk- Wadsworth Falls- Middletown Ct.
